extendedInfo.description: Carl's Pool is an easy but nevertheless fun and well developed 2D/3D billard pool game for your phone! It is challenging and waiting for awesome pool players!# Features:- 8-Ball, 9-Ball, Make15, Tournaments- Singleplayer, Multiplayer (Online)- Realistic billiard physics- Forward-, Backspin, English- Configurable aiming- 3D or 2D animated balls (check settings)- Player profiles, statistics- Highscore and replays- Chat & Buddies- AND MUCH MORE!AD SUPPORTED, please purchase pro to support developement :)Carl's Pool is an easy and addicting billiards game! Join our community of dedicated pool players and play as much billard games as you like! The app also features chat and a buddy list for your favourite pool players. Now go ahead and rack 'em!

reviews.comment: Awful game, freezes constantly, but mainly the rules are rubbish and the Ai is non existent. Uninstalled. Your darts game sucks too..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spamming fix
reviews.comment: If players spam during the game, go into the live chat window where the spam is, press and hold the spam text and hit ignore on the menu.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Casey
reviews.comment: Best pool game out there. This is the only game I still have on my phone. U should give it a try....but I have never actually seen Carl playing
reviews.author: Casey Scroggins

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I love it it\'s amazing ,, but there\'s better sites

reviews.comment: Server is horrible. I havent been able to connect to multiplaryer in a week..... This is rediculous

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Great game, but will you please ban the people posting pics of their genitals?  Seriously, vegasbaby.  Nobody wants to see your penis.

reviews.title: Bianne
reviews.comment: This was a very good game 4 1/2 stars, but now it won\'t connect when I try to play multiplayer mode. :-(. Now I give it 2 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: This app is now painfully, unplayably awful.  Until the constant locking up is fixed, and its been going on for months now, I\'ll have to uninstall this one and check back in a few months.
reviews.author: Matt Congo

reviews.title: Adrian
reviews.comment: Good game but don\'t bother trying to ask Carl any questions because he won\'t EVER reply. How does the scoring work? I can\'t figure it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun & entertaining.
reviews.comment: This app works just well, is very complete and keeps me from boring myself to death on long waits at airports and doctor\'s appointments. The only bad thing is that it doesn\'t save my personal records unless i publish them online.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent game. A little off as to where the cue ball actually hits, but when you learn to compensate it\'s a great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Carls Pool
reviews.comment: Great little game, good fun to play. Well done, works fine on my wildfire  H J

reviews.title: Full of glitches
reviews.comment: Fun, but too many glitches. Everytime you get to level 5, some glitch sends you back...

reviews.title: stop telling me there\'s an update for this stupid thing
reviews.comment: every f****** day you guys say there\'s an update for this game... but there\'s not so I\'m going on install so f*** you

reviews.title: bad
reviews.comment: don\'t waist your time. Shouldn\'t even be classed as pool. very basic and 2D  Wrong rules, they don\'t make sense. the table has wrong dimensions so impossible to get a clear shot until 5-6 balls have been potted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice time waster
reviews.comment: Physics are great, not perfect yet but good enough to make me happy, easy to play and understand, keep up the little quality games
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best!!!!!
reviews.comment: Best best best best best pool game ever!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent challenge
reviews.comment: It is difficult to get a decent challenge from this game. Medium bot is not difficult, hard bot either gets 6 in a row or intentionally gets yours in. Online play is filled with cyber pervs or people that are crazy good. Fun game, just frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Yahoo gui; sorely needs update
reviews.comment: Addicting, awesome game experience, but sadly has nagging connection and other problems that puss on the game play. Niggles such as a legit shot being declared not so, automatic alteration in position of balls amid game play etc are some of the niggles that continue to haunt it. Addicting, but not flawless!
reviews.author: A Google User
